sentence.Network_en: If I had had the big box, I would now know taupe and cerise and ecru.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要是那时有大盒的蜡笔, 我就能分辨出灰褐色,樱桃红,还有米色.

sentence.Network_en: Single cerise. Crown variegated green and cream, girl foliage. Miniature.
sentence.Network_cn: 单瓣樱桃色花. 绿色和奶油色组合成的皇冠斑白脉叶. 迷你型.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, literally cherry'

entry.def: Something that is cerise is a bright pinkish red.

means.word_mean: 1. a red the color of ripe cherries
1. having any of numerous bright or strong colors reminiscent of the color of blood or cherries or tomatoes or rubies

auth_sentence.content: His 2007 Cerise Vineyard Pinot Noir from the Anderson Valley has a spicy, deep, intense feel.
